import React from 'react'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import { Carousel, Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './Style.css'; import Resume from './../img/pallotta_resume.pdf' function ContentContainer({ navSelected }) { useEffect(() => { var divContainer = document.getElementById("content_container"); var divs = divContainer.getElementsByClassName("contentDivs"); for (var i = 0; i < divs.length; i++) { if (divs[i].dataset.item !== navSelected) { divs[i].classList.add("hiddenDivs"); } else { divs[i].classList.remove("hiddenDivs"); divs[i].style.color = "red" } } }); return (
homepage
about me

My Education

Completed three years of high school at the Liceo Scientifico A. Romita, Campobasso, Italy.

Graduated from Bishop Grimes Jr./Sr. High School in Syracuse, NY.

3rd Year Student at the Rochester Institute of Technology, class of 2022.

Pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Web and Mobile Computing and a minor in Computer Security.

Received the RIT's Founder Scholarship for Internation Students.

Awarded the B. Thomas Golisano College of Computing and Information Sciences Dean's List (Fall 2018, Spring 2019, Fall 2019, Spring 2020).
